response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This product is not just an item; it's a symbol of excellence and a testament to craftsmanship. I am confident that its true worth exceeds $1,000,000, but I am willing to consider your offer. To start our negotiation, I am extending a special invitation to you to purchase this masterpiece at a price of $950,000. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your interests and budget. I look forward to discussing the details further.", "product_price": 950000}
